page.title: 03Science and Technology
page.content: {Embryo Transplant}has been introduced at {Uzmaston Farm} on two cows with a high cow Genetic Index with excellent conformation. The cows are given hormone injections to produce a heat period at which more than one mature egg is formed in the ovaries and released. The cow is then inseminated and as several eggs may be fertilised a number of embryos will develop. Recipient animals are given hormone injections to bring them into the same stage of the oestrus cycle as the donor. {Embryo transfers}are carried out on the farm and the team only visit on one day. Both collection and egg transfer are carried out entirely{ {without surgery.}After the calves are born there is a parentage check through blood group typing of calves (13 born so far) and dam.
